title: Create a Kanban board UI
description: The board should have columns for 'To Do', 'In Progress', 'Review', and 'Done'.

title: Develop task creation functionality
description: Users should be able to add new tasks to any column with a dialog form.

title: Implement drag-and-drop for tasks
description: Tasks should be movable between columns with visual feedback.

title: Style the application
description: Add CSS to make the Kanban board responsive and look professional.

title: Setup TypeScript integration
description: Convert vanilla JavaScript to TypeScript with proper types and modular architecture.

title: Add persistence with localStorage
description: Tasks should persist in localStorage so they remain after page refresh.

title: Project planning meeting
description: Discuss the project roadmap and milestones with stakeholders.

title: Initial project setup
description: Setup the git repository and initial file structure with package.json.

title: Task editing functionality
description: Allow users to edit existing tasks with inline buttons.

title: Header and footer templates
description: Create modular header and footer templates for better organization.
